html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01972024-03-01ECCC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectInterim Order Modifying the Operation of the Heavy-duty Vehicle and Engine Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations (Trailer Standards)
PrecisOrder approving the INTERIM ORDER MODIFYING THE OPERATION OF THE HEAVY-DUTY VEHICLE AND ENGINE GREENHOUSE GAS EMISSION REGULATIONS (TRAILER STANDARDS), made by the Minister of the Environment on February 19, 2024, in order to extend the suspension of the application of the trailer greenhouse gas emission standards by up to a year to ensure continued alignment with the United States.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the INTERIM ORDER MODIFYING THE OPERATION OF THE HEAVY-DUTY VEHICLE AND ENGINE GREENHOUSE GAS EMISSION REGULATIONS (TRAILER STANDARDS), made by the Minister of the Environment on February 19, 2024, in order to extend the suspension of the application of the trailer greenhouse gas emission standards by up to a year to ensure continued alignment with the United States.
